message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $1200000 to both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1100000. This special offer is tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to acquiring this top-tier item. I believe this price not only represents a significant value proposition but also aligns closely with the product's true worth. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction.
